article.name: Bubbles
article.description: Straight on from the Blossom Drawing I drew up this picture of Bubbles. Golden yellow, hair, blue eyes, blue dress, there isn\'t much different between Bubbles and her sister\'s, but she mostly tries to look that much cuter. I think I did a good job on this one.
article.keywords: powerpuff, blossom, drawing, girls, ppg, bubbles, buttercup, cartoon network, john beech, mkv25, macromedia, flash
